title: Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site: Getting Around
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Getting Around               Getting Around      The park is only 1.3 acres, so distance is not an issue.  There is one outdoor path between the parking lot on Franklin St., the main entrance, and Delaware Ave. (the main thoroughfare bordering the Site).  Outdoor gardens are available in season, but the main Site attraction is indoors.
